originalText.text: This rating doesn't have more than 5 stars or else I would give them 10. Hope TMS has changed my life 360 degrees Dr. Ruiz and his staff are very friendly and they make you feel at home. After struggling with depression and anxiety for more than 10 yrs hope TMS has helped me tremendously. It use to be a drag for me to get out of bed and going to work everyday.  Anxiety was my everyday shadow but Dr.Ruiz and his staff helped me and the shadow is now gone. Now I sing and even dance in the shower I'm so thankful with hope TMS and would recommend it 100% my family and colleagues can tell the difference in my face. The name of the clinic says it all HOPE TMS don't forget there's always hope ay the end of the tunnel.

originalText.text: I’ve been a patient of Dr. Ruiz’s for over 6 years and I have received excellent care. He is thoughtful, attentive, has been extremely helpful to me. His office is responsive and goes above and beyond when it comes to patient needs responsiveness to call or text.

text.text: I’ve been a patient of Dr. Ruiz’s for over 6 years and I have received excellent care. He is thoughtful, attentive, has been extremely helpful to me. His office is responsive and goes above and beyond when it comes to patient needs responsiveness to call or text.

originalText.text: I'm surprised this practice is still running...legally! First of all he's always late to every appointment...not professional at all. i think he might need a neuropsychiatrist because theres this rumor going around for quite sometime, he hired his own patient. Is that even allowed by the board? This guy has no respect for my time, so why should i respect his time?  He never has the same staff im starting to wonder why...its starting to seem fishy....either way someone should complain to the board about the possibility of this man hiring his own patient. Thats too personal...i stopped coming here thankfully there are better psychiatrists who arent shady and punctual but he is not worth it

originalText.text: Ive been seeing Dr Ruiz for 3-4 years. He is very Kind and caring. He and his staff are very profesional. He listens and is an amazing Dr. who has helped to calm my mind and recently helped me focus better after having gone through this pandemic. He is always  available and is extremely knowledgeable of the medications he prescribes. I am so happy I finally found someone who listens and understands my mental needs. Thank you.

originalText.text: Incredible Dr.  Very sincere and attentive. Highly recommend.  He’s helped me immensely.
